navbar.title: Fullstack and IT Project Manager
navbar.description: Experienced professional in fullstack and frontend development with a clear mission: drive impactful digital experiences and elevate innovation to a new standard.

aboutMe.title: Experience and Skills
aboutMe.experience: Throughout my journey as a developer, I've had the opportunity to work on various projects and collaborate with talented professionals in creating technological solutions. Over time, I assumed leadership roles, providing me with extensive experience in a variety of technologies and methodologies.
aboutMe.subtitle: In my career, I've gained a deep understanding of both frontend and backend development, along with leadership skills that have enabled me to successfully manage teams.

frontend.title: Technologies I Use
frontend.description: I design efficient and appealing user interfaces for an optimal user experience.

backend.title: Tools I Use
backend.description: I develop robust and scalable systems.

leader.heading: Visionary Leader
leader.title: Methodologies and Tools
leader.description: I lead technical teams with a strategic vision, ensuring the achievement of objectives and excellence in execution.

portfolio.description: Throughout my professional journey, I have always sought to drive innovation. Each project and every line of code represent an opportunity to make a lasting impact in the technology field.
portfolio.collabText: Collab is a tool for coordinating tasks with a team of coworkers.

collab.title: Collaborate seamlessly with Collab: Simplify your work together.
collab.subTitle: Collab boosts productivity!
collab.subTitleApp: Our tool empowers you to create task cards, ensuring visibility into team capacity.
collab.subTitle2: Get insights into the status of each task.
collab.dreamTitle: From Passion for Programming: Collab's Journey
collab.dreamText: My passion for programming took me from a developer to a successful Project Manager. I aimed to create impactful web solutions. Collab was born out of the need for efficient collaboration. I developed Collab with a strong technical focus: C# .Net on the backend and React on the frontend. Today, Collab is a continuously improving team collaboration tool. My story demonstrates how management and technical skills come together in Collab.
